items.title: Ellipsis
items.description: 필요한 경우 텍스트 줄임표를 사용하여 넘친 텍스트를 줄임표(...)로 자릅니다.
items.code: The longest word in any of the major English language dictionaries is pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis, a word that refers to a lung disease contracted from the inhalation of very fine silica particles, specifically from a volcano; medically, it is the same as silicosis.
